languages.text: {n}{petname} издает пронзительный грай, широко распахнув черный клюв. Карканье поразительно напоминает издевательский смех. Когти впиваются в перекладину, крылья неудержимо хлопают — ворон привык, что его появление вызывает ужас. Похоже, его хозяин внушает подданным такие же чувства.{/n}

{n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} издает пронзительный грай, широко распахнув черный клюв. Карканье поразительно напоминает издевательский смех. Когти впиваются в перекладину, крылья неудержимо хлопают — ворон привык, что его появление вызывает ужас. Похоже, его хозяин внушает подданным такие же чувства.{/n}

It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}はくちばしを大きく開けて、甲高い鳴き声を発した。その声は、驚くほど嘲るような笑い声を思わせる。レイヴンは止まり木に鉤爪を食い込ませ、狂ったように羽ばたきながら、自分の到来に人々が恐怖に縮こまるのを見慣れているかのように見えた。どうやらその主人も、臣民たちに同じ恐怖を植え付けているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}はくちばしを大きく開けて、甲高い鳴き声を発した。その声は、驚くほど嘲るような笑い声を思わせる。レイヴンは止まり木に鉤爪を食い込ませ、狂ったように羽ばたきながら、自分の到来に人々が恐怖に縮こまるのを見慣れているかのように見えた。どうやらその主人も、臣民たちに同じ恐怖を植え付けているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} krächzt durchdringend, mit offenem Schnabel. Das Geräusch erinnert überraschend an ein spöttisches Lachen. Der Rabe hat die Krallen in die Sitzstange gegraben und schlägt hektisch mit den Flügeln. Es sieht aus, als habe er sich daran gewöhnt, dass Leute sich bei seiner Ankunft verängstigt niederkauern. Anscheinend löst {mf|sein Herr|seine Herrin} die gleiche Furcht in {mf|seinen|ihren} Untertanen aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} krächzt durchdringend, mit offenem Schnabel. Das Geräusch erinnert überraschend an ein spöttisches Lachen. Der Rabe hat die Krallen in die Sitzstange gegraben und schlägt hektisch mit den Flügeln. Es sieht aus, als habe er sich daran gewöhnt, dass Leute sich bei seiner Ankunft verängstigt niederkauern. Anscheinend löst {mf|sein Herr|seine Herrin} die gleiche Furcht in {mf|seinen|ihren} Untertanen aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} pousse un croassement perçant. Ce cri ressemble étrangement à un éclat de rire. Les serres plantées dans la branche de son perchoir et les ailes battant furieusement l'air, votre corneille semble avoir parfaitement compris comment terrifier quiconque ose s'approcher. Visiblement, {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} instille une peur identique dans le cœur de ses sujets.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} pousse un croassement perçant. Ce cri ressemble étrangement à un éclat de rire. Les serres plantées dans la branche de son perchoir et les ailes battant furieusement l'air, votre corneille semble avoir parfaitement compris comment terrifier quiconque ose s'approcher. Visiblement, {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse} instille une peur identique dans le cœur de ses sujets.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} abre mucho el pico y lanza un estridente graznido. El sonido te resulta asombrosamente similar al de una carcajada de burla. Con las garras firmemente clavadas en su percha y las alas batiendo enérgicamente, el cuervo parece acostumbrado a ver que la gente se encoge de pánico nada más verlo llegar. Por lo visto su {mf|amo|ama} infunde el mismo temor a sus súbditos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} abre mucho el pico y lanza un estridente graznido. El sonido te resulta asombrosamente similar al de una carcajada de burla. Con las garras firmemente clavadas en su percha y las alas batiendo enérgicamente, el cuervo parece acostumbrado a ver que la gente se encoge de pánico nada más verlo llegar. Por lo visto su {mf|amo|ama} infunde el mismo temor a sus súbditos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}张开了喙，发出了刺耳的嘎嘎声。令人惊讶的是，它的声音与充满嘲弄的笑声极其相似。它将利爪刺入栖木，疯狂地拍打着翅膀，仿佛在模仿人们见到它时惶恐不安的样子。看起来，它的主人也在{mf|他|她}的臣民之中灌输了同样的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} lets out a piercing croak, beak agape. The sound is surprisingly reminiscent of mocking laughter. With its talons digging into the perch and its wings beating frenziedly, the raven looks as if it has grown used to people cowering in terror upon its arrival. It appears that its master instils the same fear in {mf|his|her} subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}张开了喙，发出了刺耳的嘎嘎声。令人惊讶的是，它的声音与充满嘲弄的笑声极其相似。它将利爪刺入栖木，疯狂地拍打着翅膀，仿佛在模仿人们见到它时惶恐不安的样子。看起来，它的主人也在{mf|他|她}的臣民之中灌输了同样的恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} Gagasını açıp tiz bir çığlık kopartıyor. Sesinde alaycı bir kahkaha havası seziyorsun. Pençeleri tüneğine sıkıca gömülmüş, kanatlarını çılgınca çırparken, kuzgun sanki kendisini görünce korkudan titreyen insanlara alışmış gibi görünüyor. Görünüşe bakılırsa efendisi de tebaasına aynı dehşeti aşılıyor.{/n}
